name: Deer Shed - Making Waves
description:
Make waves ahead of the UK’s ultimate family friendly music, arts and science festival with this tap-to-play arcade game!

Featuring music from bands on the Deer Shed Festival 9 line-up, this is your chance to test your skills before entering our science tent tournament on the big screen in Baldersby Park.

From ripples to rolling tides, rapids to meandering rivers, waves come in all different shapes, sizes, frequencies and guises. Some take us sailing away, and then there’s the waves from our four live music stages that get your limbs swaying to their funky vibrations.

Whether you want to surf, slide, swim, discover the creatures of the deep or just dip your toes, we’re on your wavelength.

Life’s a wave – get ready to catch it!

www.deershedfestival.com
